/home/koibuchi/simgrid/copyX20141203/MpiEnv/simgrid/Simgrid-git/smpi_script/bin/smpicc  -O0   -std=gnu99 -g3 -g   CMakeFiles/scatter.dir/scatter.c.o  -o scatter -rdynamic ../../../lib/libsimgrid.so.3.12 -lm -lstdc++ -pthread -lrt -Wl,-rpath,/home/koibuchi/simgrid/copyX20141203/MpiEnv/simgrid/Simgrid-git/lib
